鐘.definition: a (large) bell (CL:架[jia4]); clock (CL:座[zuo4]); amount of time; o'clock (CL:點|点[dian3],分[fen1],秒[miao3]) (as in 三點鐘|三点钟[san1dian3zhong1] "three o'clock" or "three hours" or 五分鐘|五分钟[wu3fen1zhong1] "five minutes" etc)

鐘室.definition: bell chamber (at the top of a bell tower)

鐘山.definition: Zhongshan district of Liupanshui city 六盤水市|六盘水市[Liu4 pan2 shui3 shi4], Guizhou; Zhongshan county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi

鐘山區.definition: Zhongshan district of Liupanshui city 六盤水市|六盘水市[Liu4 pan2 shui3 shi4], Guizhou

鐘山縣.definition: Zhongshan county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi

鐘樓.definition: bell tower; campanile; clock tower; Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc

鐘樓區.definition: Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu

鐘樓怪人.definition: The Hunchback of Notre-Dame by Victor Hugo 維克多·雨果|维克多·雨果[Wei2 ke4 duo1 · Yu3 guo3]

鐘罩.definition: bell jar; dome (used to enclose or protect sth)

鐘鳴漏盡.definition: past one's prime; in one's declining years

鐘點房.definition: hotel room rented at an hourly rate

鐘鼎文.definition: bell-cauldron script; the 籀文 form of Chinese character used in metal inscriptions
